name: Barn Owl Quilt, Cleo
description:
This is Cleo, she is a Barn Owl, and she enjoys moonlit nights and long walks on the beach. 
(the actual quilt does not bear the "StarSparrow" watermark shown in the photo)
This mini quilt measures approx. 8.5"x10.5". Cleo is constructed from various cream, tan, and brown prints. She lives in a sky of light blue fabric with medium blue vines. The mini quilt is bound with brown & white polka dot fabric, and backed with navy fabric with cream stars (maybe her nighttime sky?). Cleo's eyes are black buttons, hand-stitched on. She is free motion quilted with scallops and lines to define all her parts, and give a hint of feathers. 
This mini quilt comes packaged in a cello bag with care instructions, ready for gifting (or as a gift for yourself!).
In constructing my mini quilts, I use only the best 100% cotton quilt-store quality fabrics, and 100% cotton batting and thread, so that this piece can be enjoyed for many generations to come. I recommend that this be used for display only, like any piece of art. If, however, it gets dirty and needs to be washed, use a mild detergent and hand/delicate wash. Air dry, and then press with the iron on the cotton setting. 
This could be framed, put into a shadow box, or hung on the wall from quilt hangers.

name: Barn Owl Quilt, Stella
description:
This is Stella, she is a Barn Owl, and she enjoys mouse tartar and picnics. 
(the actual quilt does not bear the "StarSparrow" watermark shown in the photo)
This mini quilt measures approx. 8.5"x10.5". Stella is constructed from various cream, tan, and brown prints. She lives in a night sky of navy blue fabric with cream stars. The mini quilt is bound with burgundy and cream stripe fabric, and backed with dark blue fabric with concentric rings of dots (very aboriginal). Stella's eyes are black buttons, hand-stitched on. She is free motion quilted with scallops and lines to define all her parts, and give a hint of feathers.

This could be framed, put into a shadow box, or hung on the wall from quilt hangers.

description:

This mini quilt measures approx. 8.5"x10.5". Nocturne is constructed from various cream, tan, and brown prints. He lives in a sky of deep blue concentric circles of dots (very aboriginal). name: Barn Owl Quilt, Jasper
description:
This is Jasper, he is a Barn Owl, and he enjoys staring intently, and turning his head in circles to freak people out.
(the actual quilt does not bear the "StarSparrow" watermark shown in the photo)
This mini quilt measures approx. 8.5"x11.5". Jasper is constructed from various cream, tan, and brown prints. He lives in a forest of light/medium green fabric with darker green vines and clovers. The mini quilt is bound with brown & white polka dot fabric, and backed with burgundy fabric with cream stars. Jasper's eyes are black buttons, hand-stitched on. He is free motion quilted with scallops and lines to define all his parts, and give a hint of feathers. 
This mini quilt comes packaged in a cello bag with care instructions, ready for gifting (or as a gift for yourself!).
In constructing my mini quilts, I use only the best 100% cotton quilt-store quality fabrics, and 100% cotton batting and thread, so that this piece can be enjoyed for many generations to come. I recommend that this be used for display only, like any piece of art. If, however, it gets dirty and needs to be washed, use a mild detergent and hand/delicate wash. Air dry, and then press with the iron on the cotton setting. 
This could be framed, put into a shadow box, or hung on the wall from quilt hangers.

name: Snowy Owl Quilt, Dottie
description:
This is Dottie, she is a Snowy Owl, and she enjoys snowball fights, and the smell of Pine-sol.
(the actual quilt does not bear the "StarSparrow" watermark shown in the photo)
This mini quilt measures approx. 8.5"x10.5". Dottie is constructed from black and white dot fabric. She lives in a sky of light blue fabric with medium blue vines, and sits on a grey rock with drifts of swirly white snow. The mini quilt is bound with black & white polka dot fabric, and backed with black fabric with white vines. Dottie's eyes are black buttons, hand-stitched on. She is free motion quilted with scallops, zig-zags, and lines to define all her parts, and give a hint of feathers. 
This mini quilt comes packaged in a cello bag with care instructions, ready for gifting (or as a gift for yourself!).
In constructing my mini quilts, I use only the best 100% cotton quilt-store quality fabrics, and 100% cotton batting and thread, so that this piece can be enjoyed for many generations to come. I recommend that this be used for display only, like any piece of art. If, however, it gets dirty and needs to be washed, use a mild detergent and hand/delicate wash. Air dry, and then press with the iron on the cotton setting. 
This could be framed, put into a shadow box, or hung on the wall from quilt hangers.
